product.name: Mozaic Company AMZ045111TESCP Sunbrella Canvas Navy Outdoor Seat Cushion and Back Pillow Set
product.description: Sunbrella fabrics are the complete performance standard, with best comfort, color retention, cleanability and strength that lasts. Whether transforming your patio into your personal oasis, replacing a cushion on its last leg, or hosting a gathering, Sunbrella helps you bring your vision to life with beautiful fabrics you will enjoy for years! When you choose Sunbrella performance fabrics you get complete performance–durable and stain resistant fabrics that are easy to clean. When spills or messes happen, Sunbrella fabrics can be cleaned quickly with mild soap and water so you can get back to living comfortably. All Trupedic x Sunbrella products are proudly made in North America! Trupedic uses top quality materials will last for years to come and provide just the relaxation you deserve.
product.bullet_points:
• Acrylic
• Decorative Sunbrella Fabric: Our cushion fabric is 100% woven acrylic, has a subtle texture, and is designed for durability. It is resistant to stains, UV rays, water, pilling, and abrasion. Cushions and pillows are designed for both outdoor and indoor comfort
• Plush Trupedic Foam: Trupedic is made with CertiPUR-US certified foam that is designed for durability and breathability, minimizing discomfort, and providing a plush interior that will last for years. All Trupedic products are proudly made in North America
• Long-Lasting Style: Sunbrella fabrics are designed to last season after season without showing signs of wear and tear. Each fabric style has built-in moisture resistance and can withstand the harmful effects of exposure to sun, rain, snow, and humidity
• Easy Maintenance: When spills or messes happen, your cushion fabric can be cleaned with mild soap and water. The durable and stain resistant fabric is best maintained by spot cleaning. Covers are not removable
• Perfect for Spring & Summer: Spice up your outdoor living area this season with our decorative outdoor accessories for your furniture! Whether it is for your balcony, patio, poolside, or house, we offer style versatility and long-lasting color vibrancy to complement your living spaces

specifications.material_feature: Stain Resistant, UV Resistant, Water Resistant, Pilling Resistant, Abrasion Resistant
specifications.best_sellers_rank: #311,495 in Patio, Lawn & Garden (See Top 100 in Patio, Lawn & Garden) #2,314 in Patio Furniture Cushions
specifications.product_care_instructions: Brush off loose dirt. Wash with a mild soap and lukewarm water solution. Rinse thoroughly. Allow to air dry. Cushion cover can be removed for easy cleaning
